channel.title: How do I make it say when someone kills an npc? Read
channel.description:
Ok so I need an example command so when someone kills a certain npc, it say's "Player1 has killed Npc1". Then I need to know were to add it in at.
Thanks.
__________________
anyone?

item.title: How do I make it say when someone kills an npc? Read
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Make an int for killing the monster. Kill it, the int goes ++. Int >= 1, messages goes to all.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it say when someone kills an npc? Read

item.title: How do I make it say when someone kills an npc? Read
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

here is some of it…

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"text here"; }
